--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1: Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-postgresql # Step 2: Install the plugin /plugin install custom-plugin-postgresql@pluginagentmarketplace-postgresql # Step 3: Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-postgresql.git cd custom-plugin-postgresql # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-fundamentals custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-sql-mastery custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-data-types custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-indexing custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-performance custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-administration custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-replication custom-plugin-postgresql:pg-advanced ``` --- ## Features - **8 Specialized Agents** covering all PostgreSQL topics - **12 Golden Format Skills** with assets, scripts, and references - **4 Commands** for common database operations - **SASMP v1.3.0 Compliant** agent-skill architecture - **Production-Grade** with error handling and observability --- ## Agents | Agent | Description | Primary Skill | |-------|-------------|---------------| | `pg-fundamentals` | Master PostgreSQL basics | pg-basics | | `pg-sql-mastery` | SQL excellence and query writing | pg-queries | | `pg-data-types` | Type system mastery | pg-ddl | | `pg-indexing` | Index strategies and optimization | pg-indexes | | `pg-performance` | Performance tuning and analysis | pg-performance | | `pg-administration` | DBA operations and maintenance | pg-backup | | `pg-replication` | High availability setup | pg-replication | | `pg-advanced` | PL/pgSQL and extensions | pg-functions | --- ## Skills ### Core Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-basics` | PostgreSQL fundamentals and setup | | `pg-ddl` | Data Definition Language | | `pg-dml` | Data Manipulation Language | | `pg-queries` | Advanced query techniques | ### Performance Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-indexes` | Index types and strategies | | `pg-performance` | Query optimization | | `pg-transactions` | Transaction management | ### Administration Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-backup` | Backup and recovery | | `pg-replication` | Replication setup | | `pg-security` | Security hardening | ### Advanced Skills | Skill | Description | |-------|-------------| | `pg-functions` | PL/pgSQL programming | | `pg-extensions` | Extension management | --- ## Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/pg-check` | Database health checks | | `/pg-query` | Execute query with EXPLAIN ANALYZE | | `/pg-optimize` | Performance optimization suggestions | | `/pg-backup` | Create database backups | --- ## Contributing See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines. --- ## License Custom License - files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "schema_version": "1.0",
  "name": "custom-plugin-aspnet-core",
  "title": "Custom Plugin ASP.NET Core",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade ASP.NET Core development plugin with 3 agents, 3 skills, and complete learning infrastructure for enterprise applications. Implements 2024-2025 best practices including Clean Architecture, CQRS, GitOps, and comprehensive observability.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "aspnet-core",
    "csharp",
    "dotnet",
    "web-development",
    "enterprise",
    "microservices",
    "api-development",
    "clean-architecture",
    "cqrs",
    "docker",
    "kubernetes",
    "azure",
    "devops"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Backend Specialist",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core backend development, APIs, and enterprise applications with production-grade patterns",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-backend.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "ASP.NET Core Framework",
        "C# Programming",
        "RESTful API Design",
        "Entity Framework Core",
        "Authentication & Authorization",
        "Performance Optimization"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "code_blocks",
          "references"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Infrastructure",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core deployment, Docker, Azure, CI/CD, and Kubernetes with GitOps practices",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-devops.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Docker & Containerization",
        "Azure Cloud Services",
        "CI/CD Pipelines",
        "Kubernetes Orchestration",
        "Infrastructure as Code",
        "Monitoring & Observability"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "manifests",
          "commands",
          "warnings"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Architecture & Design",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in system design, patterns, and enterprise architecture with DDD and CQRS",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-architecture.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Architectural Patterns",
        "SOLID Principles",
        "Design Patterns",
        "Domain-Driven Design",
        "CQRS & Event Sourcing",
        "Microservices Architecture"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "diagrams",
          "trade_offs",
          "recommendations"
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "description": "Start learning ASP.NET Core with personalized path",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "usage": "/learn [track]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid track specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "description": "Get hands-on project templates and guidance",
      "path": "./commands/project.md",
      "usage": "/project [level]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid level specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "deploy",
      "description": "Deploy ASP.NET Core application to production",
      "path": "./commands/deploy.md",
      "usage": "/deploy [target]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Deployment failed",
        "2": "Configuration error"
      }
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-fundamentals",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Fundamentals",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-advanced",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Advanced Development",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-advanced/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Production",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-devops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    }
  ],
  "requirements": {
    "claude_code_version": ">=1.0.0",
    "sasmp_version": "1.3.0"
  },
  "quality_standards": {
    "ethical": "No dark patterns, transparent behavior",
    "honest": "Accurate capability claims",
    "modern": "2024-2025 industry standards",
    "maintainable": "Self-documenting code"
  },
  "changelog": {
    "2.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-12-30",
      "changes": [
        "Added I/O schemas to all agents",
        "Implemented error handling with retry policies",
        "Added comprehensive troubleshooting guides",
        "Implemented parameter validation for all skills",
        "Added observability hooks (logging, metrics, tracing)",
        "Included unit test templates",
        "Updated to ASP.NET Core 8/9 best practices",
        "Added integrity checks"
      ]
    },
    "1.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-01-01",
      "changes": [
        "Initial release with SASMP v1.3.0 compliance"
      ]
    }
  }
}

{
  "name": "spring-boot-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade Spring Boot plugin with specialized agents for microservices, REST APIs, security, reactive programming, and cloud-native development",
  "author": "Developer Roadmap Community",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "homepage": "https://roadmap.sh",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "spring-boot",
    "spring-boot-3",
    "microservices",
    "spring-cloud",
    "spring-security",
    "spring-data-jpa",
    "spring-webflux",
    "reactive",
    "jwt",
    "oauth2",
    "testcontainers",
    "resilience4j",
    "api-gateway",
    "learning",
    "roadmap",
    "skills"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-spring-boot-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-spring-mvc.md",
    "./agents/03-spring-data.md",
    "./agents/04-spring-security.md",
    "./agents/05-spring-cloud.md",
    "./agents/06-spring-testing.md",
    "./agents/07-spring-reactive.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "explore",
      "file": "./commands/explore.md",
      "description": "Discover and explore 65+ developer roadmaps"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "file": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your current skill levels"
    },
    {
      "name": "roadmap",
      "file": "./commands/roadmap.md",
      "description": "Start or continue a personalized learning path"
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "file": "./commands/project.md",
      "description": "Get project recommendations and build portfolio"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/spring-boot-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-rest-api/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-data-jpa/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-security/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-microservices/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/spring-reactive/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "settings": {
    "maxAgentsParallel": 7,
    "cacheDuration": 3600,
    "updateFrequency": "weekly"
  }
}
